ygData.subject: RE: Honeycombs
ygData.msgSnippet: If you have a Dark Elf enchanter, you can cast Illusion: Human and the lower level faction spell on the two nasties in the bar in FP, talk to Gregor, get the
ygData.messageBody:
If you have a Dark Elf enchanter, you can cast Illusion: Human and the lower
level faction spell on the two nasties in the bar in FP, talk to Gregor, get
the book, run to Oggok(Where you are not KOS) Cast the faction spell on
Clurg and raise it enough to get the stein.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ralph Scott [SMTP:rscott@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, August 18, 1999 5:04 PM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Honeycombs
>
> From: Ralph Scott <rscott@...>
>
> Joel Thronburg wrote:
> >
> > From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
> >
> > Actually you only have to be level 20 to complete it easily, although I
> have
> > heard reports of enchanters as low as level 8 doing the quest.
>
> The reason you should be 20 is that you have to have ogre illusion to
> enter into
> ogguk. Enchanter websites also claim that the level 20 increase faction
> spell is also required.
>
> Otherwise you are KOS by the guards which roam around. How a level 8
> could get in (invis? but then many casters could do it) and talk to the
> bartender is beyond me.
>
> Luckily i have a level 23 enchanter so it should be easy enough.
>
> ---ralph
>
